simplified_text:
Cal Newport has written several books. 

One of them is called "So Good They Can’t Ignore You." 

Another book is "How to Be a High School Superstar." 

He also wrote "How to Become a Straight-A Student." 

Lastly, there's "How to Win at College." 

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Cal Newport has written multiple helpful books for students. These include guides on excelling in high school and college, as well as tips for achieving academic success.
summary: Knowledge story discussion knowledge perspective wisdom reflection thought understanding mind wisdom learning insight meaning perspective detail experience journey concept insight.
content:
Cal Newport has written several books. 

One of them is called "So Good They Can’t Ignore You." 

Another book is "How to Be a High School Superstar." 

He also wrote "How to Become a Straight-A Student." 

Lastly, there's "How to Win at College." 

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Cal Newport has written multiple helpful books for students. These include guides on excelling in high school and college, as well as tips for achieving academic success.
